listings.name: A Cardinal Point Vineyard & Winery
listings.description: Family-owned boutique winery specializing in small-batch Virginia wines. Intimate tasting room with panoramic views of the Rockfish Valley. Known for their award-winning Viognier and Petit Verdot. Hosts wine and cheese pairings every Saturday afternoon.

listings.name: Rockfish River Kayaking Adventures
listings.description: Guided kayak tours and rentals on the scenic Rockfish River. Perfect for beginners with gentle Class I-II rapids. Half-day and full-day trips available. All equipment provided including life jackets and dry bags. Experienced guides share local history and wildlife knowledge.

listings.name: Mountain Rose Wellness Spa
listings.description: Luxury mountain spa offering massages, facials, body treatments, and yoga classes. Uses organic and locally-sourced products. Indoor saltwater pool and eucalyptus steam room. Couples' massage suites with private balconies overlooking the mountains.

listings.name: The Copper Pot Restaurant
listings.description: Farm-to-table dining featuring seasonal menus with ingredients from local farms. Cozy atmosphere with exposed brick and wood beams. Specializes in Southern comfort food with modern twists. Famous for their fried green tomatoes and bourbon pecan pie.

listings.name: Appalachian Horse Adventures
listings.description: Guided horseback riding through scenic mountain trails. Rides range from 1-hour beginner trips to full-day advanced wilderness excursions. Well-trained horses suitable for all experience levels. Sunset rides include wine and cheese on the mountaintop.

listings.name: Nelson County Farmers Market
listings.description: Year-round indoor farmers market featuring local produce, artisan breads, handmade crafts, and specialty foods. Saturday mornings from 8am-noon. Live music and cooking demonstrations. Support over 40 local vendors and makers.

listings.name: St. George Brewing Company
listings.description: Nanobrewery and taproom in historic downtown Lovingston. Rotating selection of Belgian-style ales, IPAs, and seasonal brews. Intimate atmosphere with local art on the walls. Bring your own food or order from nearby restaurants. Trivia nights every Thursday.

listings.name: Blackrock Summit Trail
listings.description: Moderate 1-mile hike to unique rock scramble summit with 360-degree views. Part of the Appalachian Trail. Especially popular at sunrise and sunset. Rocky terrain with some challenging sections near the top. Bring sturdy hiking boots.
listings.address: Blue Ridge Parkway MP 84.8, Montebello, VA 24464

listings.name: Three Ridges Distillery
listings.description: Small-batch craft distillery producing vodka, gin, whiskey, and moonshine using Virginia grains. Tours and tastings available Friday-Sunday. Beautiful mountain views from the tasting room patio. Try their signature apple pie moonshine.

listings.name: Afton Mountain Vineyards
listings.description: Stunning mountaintop winery with sweeping valley views. Award-winning Chardonnay and Cabernet Franc. Spacious tasting room with floor-to-ceiling windows. Covered outdoor terrace perfect for picnics. Live music every Sunday afternoon in summer.

listings.name: Wintergreen Nature Foundation
listings.description: Environmental education center with 6,000 acres of protected forest. Guided nature walks, bird watching tours, and educational programs for all ages. Over 30 miles of hiking trails. Discovery Center features native wildlife exhibits and touch tanks.

listings.name: The Market at Grelen
listings.description: Upscale country market and café featuring gourmet sandwiches, artisan cheeses, local wines, and specialty foods. Beautiful grounds with gardens and picnic areas. Shop for unique gifts, home goods, and Virginia-made products. Cooking classes offered monthly.

listings.name: Virginia Artisan Cheese Trail Stop
listings.description: Specialty cheese shop featuring Virginia-made artisan cheeses. Knowledgeable staff help you create the perfect cheese board. Wine and beer pairings available. Take a cheese-making class or attend a tasting event. Ships nationwide.

listings.name: Rockfish Gap Outfitters
listings.description: Full-service outdoor gear shop and guide service. Rent bikes, kayaks, camping gear, and more. Guided mountain bike tours on local trails. Knowledgeable staff provide trail recommendations and maps. Bike repair shop on-site.

listings.name: Mountaintop Yoga Studio
listings.description: Boutique yoga studio offering daily classes in various styles including vinyasa, restorative, and hot yoga. Stunning floor-to-ceiling mountain views from the studio. Private sessions and retreats available. Also offers meditation, sound healing, and workshops.

listings.name: Brew Ridge Trail Guide Service
listings.description: Professional guided tours of Nelson County's craft beverage scene. Comfortable shuttle service visits 3-4 breweries, cideries, or wineries. Includes tastings, snacks, and local history. Book private tours or join a group. Designated driver provided.

listings.name: Cedar Creek Fly Fishing
listings.description: Guided fly fishing trips on pristine mountain streams. All skill levels welcome from beginners to experts. Equipment rental available or bring your own. Half-day, full-day, and weekend packages. Learn techniques for catching native brook trout.

listings.name: The Vintage at Nellysford
listings.description: Boutique bed and breakfast in a restored 1920s farmhouse. Five elegantly appointed rooms with private baths. Gourmet breakfast included. Wrap-around porch with mountain views. Walking distance to breweries and restaurants. Perfect romantic getaway.

listings.name: Shenandoah Chocolate Company
listings.description: Artisan chocolate maker crafting small-batch truffles, bars, and confections. Watch chocolate being made through viewing windows. Tasting room offers samples and hot chocolate. Special seasonal flavors and custom gift boxes. Chocolate-making classes available.

listings.name: Apple Orchard Falls Trail
listings.description: Moderate 2.6-mile out-and-back trail to a spectacular 200-foot waterfall. Well-maintained forest path with gradual elevation gain. Multiple viewing platforms offer different perspectives of the falls. Best visited after rainfall for maximum water flow. Popular fall foliage destination.

listings.name: The Big Test Feature
listings.description: Yet there wasn't much to say
